Title: Sparks of Life: Zaralek Cavern
Description: Zaralek Cavern is down under the Dragon Isle. Go and explore and see what you may dig up, but beware of foes who may get in your way!
ObjectivesText: Collect 100 Sparks of Life in Zaralek Cavern, while in War Mode.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
